name: Into The Border
description:
Jegus9's entry for the Game Dev Network's Cherry Jam. The protagonist needs to get through a dungeon filled with aliens and flaming grounds to get through a border, and all he's counting on is his ability to teleport to short distances and his rocket jump.

A pixel art game made with the Godot engine.

Into The Border by Guilherme Torres is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.
Based on a work at https://github.com/torresguilherme/cherry-jam.
